Classes in polimi.reds.broker.overlay used by polimi.reds
DataListener
          Components implementing this interface may listen for the arrival of new data (i.e., any Serializable object) through some Transport.
Link
          A data link between two REDS brokers.
NeighborhoodChangeListener
          Components implementing this interface may listen for the event of removing existing neighbors of the local node.
 

Classes in polimi.reds.broker.overlay used by polimi.reds.broker.overlay
AbstractTopologyManager
          An abstract topology manager providing the methods common to all topology managers.
AbstractTransport
           
AlreadyNeighborException
          Thrown to indicate that the node to add as a neighbor is already a neighbor of the local node.
ConnectivityChangeListener
          Components implementing this interface may listen for changes in the connectivity managed by some Transport, i.e., adding/removing/crashing of links.
DataListener
          Components implementing this interface may listen for the arrival of new data (i.e., any Serializable object) through some Transport.
Link
          A data link between two REDS brokers.
NeighborhoodChangeListener
          Components implementing this interface may listen for the event of removing existing neighbors of the local node.
NotConnectedException
          This class represents an exception that has to be raised when a method in charge of sending data to a neighboring broker is invoked while that broker is not connected.
NotRunningException
          Thrown to indicate that the target object was not running.
Overlay
          As its name suggests, the Overlay is the component of a REDS broker in charge of managing the overlay network of brokers on top of which CBR is performed.
PacketListener
          Components implementing this interface may listen for the arrival of new packets (i.e., any Serializable object) through some Overlay.
ReconfigurationId
          The ID assigned by the topology manager to a reconfiguration operation.
TopologyManager
          The component responsible of managing the topology of a network of REDS brokers.
Transport
          The interface of the data-link layer of a REDS broker.

          As its name suggests, the Overlay is the component of a REDS broker in charge of managing the overlay network of brokers on top of which CBR is performed.
PacketListener
